title: CEO
bioHtml:
Michael Kidder is one of the Founders and current CEO of Centerlink Technologies.  Centerlink Technologies is an Ohio-based IT services and managed solutions provider specializing in network infrastructure, cybersecurity, cloud services, and enterprise connectivity.


With more than two and a half decades of experience in information technology and B2B solutions, Mike has built Centerlink Technologies on a foundation of technical expertise, operational discipline, and a strong commitment to client outcomes. He works closely with organizations to design, secure, and manage resilient IT environmentsâ€”helping them reduce risk, improve reliability, and align technology investments with business objectives.


Mike is known for his practical, no-nonsense approach to technology strategy, particularly in areas such as managed services, Palo Alto Networks security platforms, Microsoft cloud solutions, and multi-site infrastructure design. Under his leadership, Centerlink has grown into a trusted partner for organizations seeking proactive IT management and long-term value.
